meanings.definition: Remove (someone) from a place of danger to a safe place.
meanings.sent1: During the fire drill, the teacher evacuated all the students to the playground.
meanings.sent2: The residents were evacuated from their homes due to the approaching hurricane.
meanings.sent3: The superhero quickly evacuated the civilians from the collapsing building.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the spaceship evacuated the crew just before the planet exploded.
meanings.sent5: The lifeguard skillfully evacuated the swimmers from the dangerous rip current.
